org.threadly.concurrent

Class ClockWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.threadly.concurrent.ClockWrapper

  • public class ClockWrapper
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a small wrapper class for Clock to avoid updating for bulk calls. This is primarily useful for the PriorityScheduledExecutor when it needs to do a binary search in a list of delayed items, or sort those delayed items. There is no reason to make a system call for each item, so we just pause getting accurate time for those fast but frequent operations. All the functions in this class are protected because it is not intended to be used outside of this package. This is a utility class that must be handled carefully, using it incorrectly could have serious impacts on other classes which depend on it.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
